ygData.subject: Re: What's wrong with you people?
ygData.msgSnippet: hmm I forgot the whole point of the discussion here... My point is that the enchanter is one of the greatest class to play because it s fun! Skara ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
hmm I forgot the whole point of the discussion here... My point is that the
enchanter is one of the greatest class to play because it's fun!
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: DeGirolami, Franck [mailto:degirolami@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 11:02 AM
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
Subject: [eqenchanters] What's wrong with you people?


From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>

I had a level 16 dark elf necro that I started on the first day of the
release. It took me 4 'played' days and a half to get it to level 16. then I
gave it up. I have now a level 16 enchanter. It took me 12 'played' days to
make it to 16... You think that's a problem for me? I had so much more fun
playing an enchanter. What's the deal with this level race? Sometimes I'll
spend an hour travelling back and forth just to say hi to a friend I havent
seen for a long time. Right now, I'm hunting in CrushBone and I barely make
any xp where I could be soloing in Lavastorm and make a shit load of xp and
money..but what's the big deal? I enjoy playing Everquest a lot more now.
Powergaming is so boring. So are those people who start a race everytime a
new server comes up.

my 2 cents,
Skara
